description: Manage webhooks for Azure Container Registries.

commands.name: az acr webhook create
commands.summary: Create a webhook for an Azure Container Registry.
commands.syntax:
az acr webhook create --actions {chart_delete, chart_push, delete, push, quarantine}
                      --name
                      --registry
                      --uri
                      [--headers]
                      [--location]
                      [--resource-group]
                      [--scope]
                      [--status {disabled, enabled}]
                      [--tags]
examples: az acr webhook create -n mywebhook -r myregistry --uri http://myservice.com --actions push delete
az acr webhook create -n mywebhook -r myregistry --uri http://myservice.com --actions push --headers "Authorization=Basic 000000"
az acr webhook create -n mywebhook -r myregistry --uri http://myservice.com --actions chart_push chart_delete

commands.name: az acr webhook delete
commands.summary: Delete a webhook from an Azure Container Registry.
examples: az acr webhook delete -n mywebhook -r myregistry

commands.name: az acr webhook get-config
commands.summary: Get the service URI and custom headers for the webhook.
examples: az acr webhook get-config -n mywebhook -r myregistry

commands.name: az acr webhook list
commands.summary: List all of the webhooks for an Azure Container Registry.
examples: az acr webhook list -r myregistry -o table

commands.name: az acr webhook list-events
commands.summary: List recent events for a webhook.
examples: az acr webhook list-events -n mywebhook -r myregistry

commands.name: az acr webhook ping
commands.summary: Trigger a ping event for a webhook.
examples: az acr webhook ping -n mywebhook -r myregistry

commands.name: az acr webhook show
commands.summary: Get the details of a webhook.
examples: az acr webhook show -n mywebhook -r myregistry

commands.name: az acr webhook update
commands.syntax:
az acr webhook update --name
                      --registry
                      [--actions {chart_delete, chart_push, delete, push, quarantine}]
                      [--add]
                      [--force-string]
                      [--headers]
                      [--remove]
                      [--resource-group]
                      [--scope]
                      [--set]
                      [--status {disabled, enabled}]
                      [--tags]
                      [--uri]
examples: az acr webhook update -n mywebhook -r myregistry --headers "Authorization=Basic 000000"
az acr webhook update -n mywebhook -r myregistry --uri http://myservice.com --actions push delete
az acr webhook update -n mywebhook -r myregistry --status disabled
